videos.description: Killian Hayes dishes a nice pass to Isaiah Stewart who slams for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hayes' dime sets up Stewart's jam) 2021/04/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayes' dime sets up Stewart's jam
